name: Astro Golf (itch)
description:
An ever-changing planetscape, some tricky gravity, and a golf ball.

Astro Golf is a simple, relaxing interplanetary golf game. Play 15 free holes on iOS and Android, or download on PC below!

  

Attempt to master the tricky gravitational fields of the planets. Progress through endless unique levels, all with a par of one.

Play on the subway, whilst waiting for a taxi, when brushing your teeth! Increase your hole-in-one streak! Decrease your shot average! Become an orbital mechanics magician!

The first 15 levels are free on iOS and Android, and endless levels can be unlocked via an In-App-Purchase. On PC, Mac and Linux, the full game is unlocked from the start - get it below!
